title: Likely North Korean defector sneaks back across the border from South Korea into the isolated land of Kim Jong Un
content:
1. Likely North Korean defector sneaks back across the border from South Korea into the isolated land of Kim Jong Un  CBS News
  2. How a Gymnast Casually Strolled Into North Korea After Defecting to the South  Daily Beast
  3. Seoul Says North Korea Defector Likely Made Rare Border Crossing Back  NPR
  4. Returned N.Korea defector struggled to resettle in South, lived meagre life  Yahoo News
  5. North Korea 're-defector' likely ex-gymnast who escaped in 2020  New York Post
